attributes.action: Cut down the transport prices for both buses and trains
attributes.background: Transportation has become increasingly high over the last few years in London and this is unacceptable especially to those who can't afford it. Therefore there must be a change to lower transport prices for both buses and trains.

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because the issue you raise is not the responsibility of the Government or Parliament. The cost of transport in London is the responsibility of TfL, which is accountable to the London Assembly.

The London Assembly has its own petitions process. You can find out more about how to petition the London Assembly here:

https://www.london.gov.uk/mayor-assembly/london-assembly/take-part/petitions
